title: YouTube removes Jordan Peterson interview with RFK Jr. for violating vaccine misinformation policy
author: JACKSON SINNENBERG; The National Desk
description: Democratic presidential nominee Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is once again in the headlines over his comments on COVID vaccines.
